recentSixBlogs.title: Angular 16 - What you need to know
recentSixBlogs.description: Yesterday Angular team released version 16 of their framework and they've termed it as the biggest release since its inception. Is it? Let's see.

recentSixBlogs.title: Thoughts on -10x Engineer
recentSixBlogs.description: My thoughts on the blog post 'How to be a -10x engineer', which was quite popular in Hacker News.

recentSixBlogs.title: Deploying a nodejs app in fly.io and some struggles
recentSixBlogs.description: This is a brief writeup about deploying a simple nodejs application in fly.io. While doing it I had to overcome few technical difficulties and if you can avoid it, it may help you to save some time.

recentSixBlogs.title: A failed app idea and some new learnings
recentSixBlogs.description: If we could generate transcript files offline, how can we integrate it with audio files. I was thinking about something similar to external subtitle files used in video players. Came to know that it is possible with the help of TextTracks and WebVTT format. I did a small POC and it went well.

recentSixBlogs.title: Run Stable Diffusion in Azure
recentSixBlogs.description: Hardware requirement are pretty challenging for most of the machine learning needs, stable diffusion is no different. I've an Azure subscription can I make use of that?
